name: Castle Concept Game
description:
A simple prototype to show the core resource-based mechanic of the game.

It is a Castle tycoon game where the player must collect resources in order to upgrade production and collect more resources.

In future, with these resources, the player will be able to upgrade the walls higher and higher in order to keep out a flood (caused by the nearby well) or a fire (More historically accurate) and stop it from destroying Dafydd ap Gruffydd's castle.
